citations.narrative:
*This pet store currently has only domestic animals for sale, however, the store also currently exhibits an adult
bobcat and a young fox. During today's visit the bobcat was on display. The young fox was sleeping in a basket in a
cage behind a puppy gate barrier. When a customer asked to pet the fox, the facility representative held the fox and
allowed the customer to pet it.
*A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal
Welfare Act and Regulations.
*The facility needs to obtain a USDA license before exhibiting and/or selling exotic mammals or needs to
discontinue regulated activities altogether.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with owner.

narrative:
2.1(a)(1)                    REPEAT
REQUIREMENTS AND APPLICATION.
*This pet store currently has only domestic animals for sale, however, the store also currently exhibits an adult
bobcat and a young fox. During today's visit the bobcat was on display. The young fox was sleeping in a basket in a
cage behind a puppy gate barrier. When a customer asked to pet the fox, the facility representative held the fox and
allowed the customer to pet it. 
*A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal
Welfare Act and Regulations. 
*The facility needs to obtain a USDA license before exhibiting and/or selling exotic mammals or needs to 
discontinue regulated activities altogether. 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.    
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with owner.

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
